name: Newsweek
overview:
Newsweek, Inc. publishes a weekly magazine. Its magazine covers various topics in national and international affairs, politics, life/health, business, science and technology, society, and arts and entertainment. The company also offers the weekly magazine online, daily news updates, Web-only columns, photo galleries, and audio and video reports from podcasts, and mobile content and archives. It offers its services through a network of correspondents, reporters, and editors.

The company was founded in 1933 and is based in New York, New York. Newsweek, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of The Washington Post Company.
